name: Miguel Vargas
bio: Miguel Vargas is a tenacious midfielder with an unyielding spirit, known for his precise tackles and uncanny ability to read the game. Hailing from the vibrant streets of Mérida, he embodies the heart of Yucatán Force, making him a fan favorite. With a slick, left-footed shot and an eye for connecting plays, he consistently brings intensity and flair to every match.
